title: I think Autofill in rank quene is just fking stupid!!!!
body:
No idea why riot fking get autofill in rank. If people fill in the quene, why let them choose the position they want???
I dont care abt waiting for 5 mins for a game, but some people who get a sup fill role just troll, feed in the game all the time.
Also, i can play top mid ad sup but only jg is not my main and I'm not even familiar with the new jg things, the changes all the time in jg.
And I always get a fill jg role. What can i say? does that mean play league of legends have to play 5 roles for every player?

replies.body: I wish there was a remove button for all the stupid rants such as these.
